# productId

**Type**

The unique identifier of the product.

## Declaration

```swift
string productId
```

## Discussion

You define product IDs in App Store Connect. Product IDs are unique within your app.

## Product information

- **type**: The type of In-App Purchase products you can offer in your app.
- **subscriptionGroupIdentifier**: The identifier of the subscription group that the subscription belongs to.
- **quantity**: The number of purchased consumable products.
